mapper.insert: insert into FcubeReply (CommentNo, Cubeuuid, Uid, Bgroup, Sorts, Depth, CommentText, CommentTime) values (#{commentno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sorts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commenttext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update FcubeReply set Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bgroup = #{bgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sorts = #{sorts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Depth = #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CommentText = #{commenttext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CommentTime = #{commenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CommentNo = #{commentno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CommentNo, Cubeuuid, Uid, Bgroup, Sorts, Depth, CommentText, CommentTime from FcubeReply
select CommentNo, Cubeuuid, Uid, Bgroup, Sorts, Depth, CommentText, CommentTime from FcubeReply
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ReplyCount FROM FcubeReply A WHERE A.cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid} AND A.Sorts = 0 AND A.Depth=0
